message.body: Hey, we are looking to do something tomorrow. The nice folks we are staying with have to work tomorrow so if you want to hang out tomorrow it would be great for us.
Ok, we should do that. I have a few hours to spare.
What's your schedule look like?
It looks like we will get dropped off at nickel diner tomorrow for bfast and putter around there till noon. Do you think you will be able to meet us near there around noon?
Sure thing, that's closer to me anyway.
Cool let me know when u are comming and I'll let u know exactly where we end up
Will do.
Thanks man
Bring Yaron if he's available
Good idea.
What time you guys want to be picked up?
Noon or whenever u are ready were not in any hury
We are on Los Angeles street in the toy district currently
Gonna shoot for 1pm. There is a great bookstore downtown if you need to kill time. It's called The Last Bookstore.
Great! We are heading to the book store and will meet u there
I am on the corner of 5th and spring.
By DNO.
I went to a burger cafe to use the bathroom. I'll call u in one min
Where is that?
Were at 6 and spring
I am facing south in front of a white van.
